title: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: The All types dialog shows obfuscated classes in JDK 1.4, including classes like 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', etc.
OB: When accessing the All types dialog, obfuscated classes are displayed.
EB: When accessing the All types dialog, obfuscated classes should not be displayed.
SR:
To resolve this issue, there are two suggested options:

a) Sort lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter.
b) Filter out obfuscated classes completely.

It is recommended to implement option 'a'.
